ai-patthana16.24:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.24:0.3_0: used to be looked forwards and so on.
ai-patthana16.24:1.1_0: Unskillfulness arises in someone who isn’t skilled in the teaching, not skilled in terms of causes.
ai-patthana16.24:3.1_0: ... five objects have been reborn in the realm of luminous objects.
